content:

- 50mg: 10

### Protocol Deviations
- PD ID: RB-PD-0135, Description: Blood pressure measurement not recorded at visit, Severity: minor
- PD ID: RB-PD-0112, Description: Lab kit expired, replacement used, Severity: minor

### Events
- Protocol training refresher completed for site coordinators
- Site 01 monitoring visit completed, 3 findings
- eCRF query resolution: 14 queries closed this week

### Notes
- Week 1: Renal biomarker collection on schedule. 37 subjects enrolled across 4 cohorts. eGFR and urinary biomarkers within expected variability.
